title: "Neon Robot Dreams"
content:
# Neon Robot Dreams

Welcome to Neon Robot Dreams, a website dedicated to exploring the intersection of retro-futurism and technology. Our site features a collection of articles, videos, and podcasts that delve into the world of vintage sci-fi and its influence on modern-day tech.

Join us as we explore the dreams of the past and the realities of the present. From robots to rocket ships, our content covers a wide range of topics that will transport you to a world where anything is possible.

Whether you're a fan of classic sci-fi or a tech enthusiast looking for inspiration, Neon Robot Dreams has something for everyone. So sit back, relax, and let your imagination take flight with us.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A retro-futuristic wallpaper featuring a vintage illustration of a robot, set against a neon-colored background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
